result.execSummary:
The defendant Troy R. Sigmund was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department.   The costs shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 a month beginning at June 1, 2017.

The jail sentence shall begin no later than June 15, 2017 at 4:30 pm.  The jail sentence may be served with huber and good time.  The defendant shall pay all sheriff and jail fees or costs allowed or imposed by law and the sheriff shall be entitled to a judgment against the defendant for any such unpaid fees or costs.  

Jail can be served in any county in the State of Wisconsin provided arrangements are made by counsel or the defendant, it is approved by the Taylor County Jail, and at no additional cost to Taylor County.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy R. Sigmund

Current: 715 West Allman, Medford, WI 54451 United States  (Effective: 05-17-2017)
Prior: 600 W. Hickory St., Gilman, WI 54433 United States

Defendant Troy R. Sigmund in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record.  Plea of no contest to count 1.  Plea colloquy.  Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court dismisses and read in count 2.  Court finds defendant guilty of count 1.  Statement by Attorney Laufenberg.  Court orders court costs; DNA sample and surcharge; 4 days county jail with huber and good time to begin no later than June 15, 2017 at 4:30 pm.  Court orders costs to be paid at the rate of $100.00 a month beginning June 1, 2017.  - rt
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 15, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.  Defendant shall not possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Troy R. Sigmund in court with attorney Alec Nocco appearing specially .  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court quashes warrant.  Attorney Nocco indicated not sure if he qualifies for a public defender.   Waive reading of complaint and charges.   Plea of not guilty to all charges.   Court orders a $500.00 signature bond; booking and no possession or consumption of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 01:45 pm.  - rt

Defendant Troy R. Sigmund not in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mr. Sigmund signed an admission of service and he has not appeared.  It is now 1:35 pm.  The court issues a body only warrant.  - rt
by Troy R. Sigmund
